definitions.definition: The act of conveying from one place to another; the act of transferring or the fact of being transferred .
The process by which emotions and desires , originally associated with one person, such as a parent , are unconsciously shifted to another.

main_definition: The act of conveying from one place to another; the act of transferring or the fact of being transferred .
secondary_definitions: ( psychology , psychiatry ) The process by which emotions and desires , originally associated with one person, such as a parent , are unconsciously shifted to another.
